Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±4.435 acres; Potential to assemble ±7.265 contigous acres with the purchase of the neighboring parcel (currently on the market for sale)
Zoned Commercial Mixed Use-3 (CX-3-CU)

Permitted uses include retail sales, personal services, restaurants, convenience store (with additional standards), office, medical office, hotel/motel, some indoor recreation facilities, outdoor recreation, single family and multifamily residential, etc.
Located in the Special Highway Overlay District-1 (SHOD-1)
Future land use calls for Community Mixed Use
Adjacent ±2.83 acre parcel will probably need to be purchased to obtain access; Preliminary discussions with NCDOT state only right-in access off of Poole Road is likely
Water and sewer available to serve the property

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Property is conveniently located just off the I-440/Poole Road interchange, approximately 1 mile from I-87, 3.5 miles from Downtown Raleigh and 4.5 miles from I-540

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±6.08 acres
Zoned Industrial Mixed Use-3 (IX-3)
Permitted uses include medical, office, restaurant, retail sales, light industrial, research and development, some personal services, indoor/outdoor recreation, etc.
Future land use calls for Community Mixed Use
Property is located in a NC Opportunity Zone and qualifies for tax incentives
Municipal water and sewer service available
±0.77 acres
Zoned Commercial Mixed Use-3 (CX-3)
Permitted uses include townhomes, medical, office, some personal services, restaurant, some retail sales, light manufacturing, research & development, etc.
Future land use calls for Community Mixed Use
Property is partially fenced
Active Norfolk Southern rail line located along the western property line
Municipal water and sewer service available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Site is located just off Hammond Road at the corner of Rush Street and Shelden Drive in South Raleigh. Existing curb cut off Rush Street to provide full access to the property.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±35.77 Acres
Zoned Industrial Mixed Use-3 (IX-3)
Future land use calls for Business & Commercial Services
Partially located in the SHOD-2 overlay district
City of Raleigh water and sewer service
Located in a NC Opportunity Zone with potential tax incentives

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located just minutes south of downtown Raleigh, the property is centrally located in the Triangle 10 minutes from NC State University, 13 minutes from North Hills, 18 minutes from RDU International Airport, 23 minutes from the Research Triangle Park, and 30 minutes from downtown Durham and Duke University.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: A 35.77-acre urban mixed use development opportunity with Opportunity Zone tax benefits located off I-40 in downtown Raleigh

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Three parcels totaling ±3.72 acres
Currently zoned Residential-4 (R-4) (City of Raleigh ETJ)
Permitted uses include single family detached homes on a minimum lot size of 10,000 sq. ft.
Future land use calls for Low Density Residential (City of Raleigh ETJ)
City of Raleigh water and sewer available
Great opportunity for small 6-12 lot residential subdivision
Call for pricing

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Property is located adjacent to the Lynn Road Elementary School, just minutes from the Aldi-anchored Lynnwood Collection Shopping Center, Harris Teeter, and the Food
Lion-anchored Creedmoor Crossings Shopping Center

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Currently zoned Residential-40 Watershed (R-40W) (Wake County ETJ)
Permitted uses include single family detached homes on a minimum lot size of 40,000 sq. ft.
Future land use calls for Residential < 1 Unit/Acre (Wake County ETJ)
Property will likely need to be served by private well and septic systems

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Property is located 1.5 miles from I-540, with neighboring amenities including the Harris Teeter-anchored Leesville Towne Centre shopping center and Publix.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great opportunity for a large single family estate or a small residential subdivision
